import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./Book.css"; import {FaStar,FaStarHalfAlt} from 'react-icons/fa'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Reviews/Star' function Book({book}) { const [show,setShow]=useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleClick= () => { setShow(true) } const handleClose= () => { setShow(false)} return (
{book.volumeInfo.title}
Publisher: {book.volumeInfo.publisher}
Author: {book.volumeInfo.authors}
Publish Year: {book.volumeInfo.publishedDate}
{show &&

{book.volumeInfo.title}

{book.volumeInfo.description}

Author: {book.volumeInfo.authors}
Publish Year: {book.volumeInfo.publishedDate}

Average Rating : {book.volumeInfo.ratingsCount}

{book.accessInfo.epub.downloadLink!=undefined&& }
}
) } export default Book
